Encapsulates the progress of a Service Fabric upgrade.

UnhealthyEvaluations UnhealthyEvaluations

Edit

Gets the health evaluations which describe the data and the algorithm used by health manager to evaluate cluster health. Only populated when the clusterâ€™s aggregated health state is Error. When the upgrade rolls back because of health evaluation, it provides a snapshot view of the health at the time the health check was performed.

public IList<HealthEvaluation> UnhealthyEvaluations { get; }Public ReadOnly Property UnhealthyEvaluations As IList(Of HealthEvaluation)
Value
IList<HealthEvaluation> IList(Of HealthEvaluation)

The unhealthy evaluations that led to current aggregated health state. The items in the list can be of the following types: ApplicationsHealthEvaluation, NodesHealthEvaluation, UpgradeDomainNodesHealthEvaluation, SystemApplicationHealthEvaluation oror EventHealthEvaluation.
